00147 //----------------------------------------------------------
00148 void UTServeThreadCreate( const char* workingFolder, unsigned short port, bool localOnly )
00149 {
00150         _localOnly = localOnly;
00151 
00153         if ( _serveThread != 0 )
00154                 return;
00155 
00157         _workingFolderLen = ( int )strlen( workingFolder );
00158         _workingFolder = new char[ _workingFolderLen + 2 ];
00159 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00160         strcpy_s( _workingFolder, _workingFolderLen + 2, workingFolder );
00161 #else
00162         strcpy( _workingFolder, workingFolder );
00163 #endif
00164 
00166         if ( _workingFolder[ _workingFolderLen-1 ] != '/' &&
00167                  _workingFolder[ _workingFolderLen-1 ] != '\\' )
00168         {
00169                 _workingFolder[ _workingFolderLen ] = '/';
00170                 _workingFolder[ ++_workingFolderLen ] = '\0';
00171         }
00172 
00174         _strScratch = new char[ STRING_BUFFER_LEN ];
00175 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00176         strcpy_s( _strScratch, STRING_BUFFER_LEN, _workingFolder );
00177 #else
00178         B_ASSERT( strlen( _workingFolder ) < STRING_BUFFER_LEN - 1 );
00179         strncpy( _strScratch, _workingFolder, STRING_BUFFER_LEN );
00180         _strScratch[ STRING_BUFFER_LEN - 1] = 0;
00181 #endif
00182 
00184         _tempBuffer = new char[ UT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE ];
00185 
00187         _combineBuffer = new char[ SEND_BUFFER_SIZE ];
00188 
00190         _run = true;
00191         unsigned int threadId = 0;
00192         _serveThread = ( void* )_beginthreadex( NULL, 32768, UTServeThreadProc, ( void* )( size_t )port, 0, &threadId );
00193 
00195         while ( !_serverReady )
00196                 Sleep( 0 );
00197 }

00199 //----------------------------------------------------------
00200 void UTServeThreadClose()
00201 {
00204         _run = false;
00205 
00207         if ( _serveThread )
00208         {
00210                 WaitForSingleObject( _serveThread, INFINITE );
00211                 SafeCloseHandle( ( HANDLE )_serveThread );
00212         }
00213 
00215         delete[] _combineBuffer;
00216         delete[] _workingFolder;
00217         delete[] _strScratch;
00218         delete[] _tempBuffer;
00219 
00221         _serveThread = 0;
00222         _serverReady = false;
00223 }

00230 //----------------------------------------------------------
00231 int UTServe( unsigned short port )
00232 {
00234         timeBeginPeriod( 1 );
00235 
00237         WSADATA wsaData;
00238         if ( WSAStartup( MAKEWORD( 1, 1 ), &wsaData ) != 0 )
00239                 return -1;
00240 
00242         HANDLE store = CreateFileMapping( INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE, NULL, PAGE_READWRITE | SEC_COMMIT,
00243                 0, 2 * UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_SIZE, UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_NAME );
00244         _localBuffer = MapViewOfFile( store, FILE_MAP_ALL_ACCESS, 0, 0, 2 * UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_SIZE );
00245         _sendBuffer = _localBuffer;
00246         _recvBuffer = ( char* )_localBuffer + UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_SIZE;
00247 
00249         int retVal = UTDoServe( port );
00250 
00252         UnmapViewOfFile( _localBuffer );
00253         _localBuffer = 0;
00254 
00256         SafeCloseHandle( store );
00257 
00259         WSACleanup();
00260 
00262         timeEndPeriod( 1 );
00263 
00265         return retVal;
00266 }

00268 //----------------------------------------------------------
00269 static int UTDoServe( unsigned short port )
00270 {
00272         _lastPollTime = timeGetTime();
00273         _curBytesRead = 0;
00274         _curBytesWritten = 0;
00275         _curTotalBytesSent = 0;
00276         _curTotalBytesReceived = 0;
00277 
00279         timeval noTimeout;
00280         noTimeout.tv_sec = 0;
00281         noTimeout.tv_usec = 0;
00282 
00284         _primarySocket = socket( AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP );
00285 
00287         char yes = 1;
00288         if ( setsockopt( _primarySocket, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &yes, sizeof( int ) ) == -1 ) 
00289         {
00290                 PrintF( "Error setting a socket option! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00291                 closesocket( _primarySocket );
00292                 return -1;
00293         } 
00294 
00296         sockaddr_in localAddr;
00297         UTMakeSockAddr( &localAddr, INADDR_ANY, port );
00298         if ( bind( _primarySocket, ( sockaddr* )&localAddr, sizeof( localAddr ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00299         {
00300                 PrintF( "Error binding socket! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00301                 closesocket( _primarySocket );
00302                 return -1;
00303         }
00304 
00306         if ( !UTSetSocketAsync( _primarySocket, true ) )
00307         {
00309                 closesocket( _primarySocket );
00310                 return -1;
00311         }
00312 
00314         if ( !UTSetSocketBuffered( _primarySocket, false ) )
00315         {
00317                 closesocket( _primarySocket );
00318                 return -1;
00319         }
00320 
00322         if ( listen( _primarySocket, SOMAXCONN ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00323         {
00324                 closesocket( _primarySocket );
00325                 PrintF( "Unable to put the socket into a listening state! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00326                 return -1;
00327         }
00328 
00330         _serverReady = true;
00331 
00333         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < UT_CONNECTION_MAX; ++i )
00334         {
00335                 _connections[ i ].socket = INVALID_SOCKET;
00336                 _connections[ i ].enabled = 0;
00337         }
00338 
00340         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < UT_STREAMS_MAX; ++i )
00341         {
00342                 _streams[ i ].refCount = 0;
00343                 UTX_InitStream( &_streams[ i ].stream );
00344         }
00345 
00347         unsigned int time = timeGetTime();
00348         unsigned int prevConnCheckTime = timeGetTime();
00349         while ( _run )
00350         {
00352                 Sleep(1);
00353 
00355                 if ( !_localOnly || _connections[ 0 ].enabled == 0 )
00356                 {
00358                         unsigned int curTime = timeGetTime();
00359                 
00361                         if ( ( curTime - prevConnCheckTime ) > 1000 )
00362                         {
00363                                 prevConnCheckTime = curTime;
00364                                 if ( !CheckForNewConnections() )
00365                                 {
00366                                         Cleanup();
00367                                         return -1;
00368                                 }
00369                         }
00370                 }
00371 
00373                 if ( !UpdateConnections() )
00374                 {
00375                         Cleanup();
00376                         return -1;
00377                 }
00378 
00380                 unsigned int curTime = timeGetTime();
00381 
00383                 unsigned int delta = curTime - time;
00384                 if ( delta < UT_UPDATE_INTERVAL )
00385                 {
00386                         Sleep( UT_UPDATE_INTERVAL - delta );
00387                         time = timeGetTime();
00388                 }
00389                 else
00390                         time = curTime;
00391         }
00392 
00394         Cleanup();
00395         return 0;
00396 }
00397 
00398 //----------------------------------------------------------
00399 bool CheckForNewConnections()
00400 {
00402         sockaddr_in newConn;
00403         int newConnSize = sizeof( sockaddr_in );
00404         SOCKET newSock = accept( _primarySocket, ( sockaddr* )&newConn, &newConnSize );
00405         if ( newSock == SOCKET_ERROR )
00406         {
00407                 int error = WSAGetLastError();
00408                 if ( error != WSAEWOULDBLOCK )
00409                 {
00410                         PrintF( "Failed to accept a connection! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00411                         return false;
00412                 }
00413         }
00414         else
00415         {
00417                 UTSetSocketBuffered( newSock, false );
00418 
00420                 unsigned int i = 0;
00421                 for ( ; i < UT_CONNECTION_MAX; ++i )
00422                 {
00423                         if ( _connections[ i ].socket == INVALID_SOCKET )
00424                         {
00426                                 _connections[ i ].socket = newSock;
00427                                 _connections[ i ].enabled = 0;
00428                                 _connections[ i ].sendProc = send;
00429                                 _connections[ i ].recvProc = recv;
00430                                 _connections[ i ].ioctlProc = ioctlsocket;
00431                                 UTMessageQueueCreate( &_connections[ i ].inQueue, IN_QUEUE_SIZE );
00432                                 UTMessageQueueCreate( &_connections[ i ].outQueue, OUT_QUEUE_SIZE );
00433                                 break;
00434                         }
00435                 }
00436 
00438                 if ( i == UT_CONNECTION_MAX )
00439                         closesocket( newSock );
00440         }
00441 
00443         return true;
00444 }
00445 
00446 //----------------------------------------------------------
00447 bool UpdateConnections()
00448 {
00450         unsigned int curTime = timeGetTime();
00451         unsigned int statDelta = curTime - _lastPollTime;
00452         if ( statDelta > PERF_TIMING_UPDATE_SPEED )
00453         {
00455                 _bytesReadPerSec = ( _curBytesRead * statDelta ) / 1000;
00456                 _bytesWrittenPerSec = ( _curBytesWritten * statDelta ) / 1000;
00457                 _totalBytesSentPerSec = ( _curTotalBytesSent * statDelta ) / 1000;
00458                 _totalBytesReceivedPerSec = ( _curTotalBytesReceived * statDelta ) / 1000;
00459                 _readsPerSec = ( _curReads * statDelta ) / 1000;
00460                 _readsCancelledPerSec = ( _curReadsCancelled * statDelta ) / 1000;
00461                 _lastPollTime = curTime;
00462 
00463 #if PERF_TIMING_PRINT
00464                 PrintF( "=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=\n" );
00465                 PrintF( "[UberServer] Total bytes read per second:      %d\n", _bytesReadPerSec );
00466                 PrintF( "[UberServer] Total written read per second:    %d\n", _bytesWrittenPerSec );
00467                 PrintF( "[UberServer] Total bytes sent per second:      %d\n", _totalBytesSentPerSec );
00468                 PrintF( "[UberServer] Total bytes received per second:  %d\n", _totalBytesReceivedPerSec );
00469                 PrintF( "[UberServer] Total reads per second:           %d\n", _readsPerSec );
00470                 PrintF( "[UberServer] Total reads cancelled per second: %d\n", _readsCancelledPerSec );
00471 #endif
00472 
00474                 _curBytesRead = 0;
00475                 _curBytesWritten = 0;
00476                 _curTotalBytesSent = 0;
00477                 _curTotalBytesReceived = 0;
00478                 _curReads = 0;
00479                 _curReadsCancelled = 0;
00480         }
00481 
00483         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < UT_CONNECTION_MAX; ++i )
00484         {
00486                 SConnection& connection = _connections[ i ];
00487 
00489                 if ( connection.socket == INVALID_SOCKET )
00490                         continue;
00491 
00493                 unsigned long dataWaiting = 0;
00494                 if ( connection.ioctlProc( connection.socket, FIONREAD, &dataWaiting ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00495                 {
00496                         PrintF( "Failed to poll socket for data! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00497                         return false;
00498                 }
00499 
00501                 if ( dataWaiting > 0 )
00502                 {
00504                         if ( connection.enabled == 0 && dataWaiting >= UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_SIZE )
00505                         {
00507                                 char buffer[ 32 ];
00508                                 recv( connection.socket, buffer, 8, 0 );
00509 
00511                                 if ( strcmp( buffer, UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_REMOTE ) == 0 )
00512                                 {
00514                                         if ( send( connection.socket, UT_HANDSHAKE_ACCEPT, UT_HANDSHAKE_ACCEPT_SIZE, 0 ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00515                                         {
00517                                                 PrintF( "Failed to notify a client of connection acceptance! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00518                                                 CloseConnection( i );
00519                                                 continue;
00520                                         }
00521                                         connection.enabled = 1;
00522                                         connection.local = false;
00523 
00525                                         connection.sendProc = send;
00526                                         connection.recvProc = recv;
00527                                         connection.ioctlProc = ioctlsocket;
00528                                 }
00529                                 else if ( strcmp( buffer, UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_LOCAL ) == 0 )
00530                                 {
00532                                         _sendMutex = CreateMutex( NULL, FALSE, UT_SERVER_MUTEX_NAME );
00533 
00535                                         int length = ( int )strlen( UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_NAME ) + 1;
00536                                         if ( send( connection.socket, ( const char* )&length, sizeof( length ), 0 ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00537                                         {
00539                                                 PrintF( "Failed to notify a client of connection acceptance! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00540                                                 CloseConnection( i );
00541                                                 continue;
00542                                         }
00543 
00545                                         if ( send( connection.socket, UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_NAME, UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_NAME_SIZE, 0 ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00546                                         {
00548                                                 PrintF( "Failed to notify a client of connection acceptance! %s\n", UTGetErrorString() );
00549                                                 CloseConnection( i );
00550                                                 continue;
00551                                         }
00552                                         connection.enabled = 1;
00553                                         connection.local = true;
00554 
00556                                         connection.sendProc = SendLocal;
00557                                         connection.recvProc = RecvLocal;
00558                                         connection.ioctlProc = IoctlLocal;
00559 
00561                                         _recvMutex = OpenMutex( SYNCHRONIZE, FALSE, UT_CLIENT_MUTEX_NAME );
00562 
00564                                         memset( _sendBuffer, 0, 8 );
00565                                         memset( _recvBuffer, 0, 8 );
00566                                 }
00567                                 else
00568                                 {
00570                                         CloseConnection( i );
00571                                 }
00572                         }
00573                         else if ( connection.enabled != 0 )
00574                         {
00576                                 int bytesReceived = 0;
00577                                 UTMessageQueueRecv( &connection.inQueue, connection.socket, &bytesReceived,
00578                                         connection.recvProc, connection.ioctlProc );
00579 
00582                                 _curTotalBytesReceived += bytesReceived;
00583                         }
00584                 }
00585 
00587                 size_t count = UTMessageQueueCount( &connection.inQueue );
00588                 count = Min( count, (size_t)5 );
00589                 while ( count-- > 0 )
00590                 {
00591                         if ( !HandleMessage( _connections + i ) )
00592                                 break;
00593                 }
00594 
00596                 UpdateConnectionOutgoing( &connection );
00597         }
00598 
00600         return true;
00601 }
00602 
00603 //----------------------------------------------------------
00604 void UpdateConnectionOutgoing( SConnection* connection )
00605 {
00607         int bytesSent = 0;
00608         UTMessageQueueSend( connection->socket, &connection->outQueue,
00609                 _combineBuffer, SEND_BUFFER_SIZE, &bytesSent, connection->sendProc );
00610         _curTotalBytesSent += bytesSent;
00611 }
00612 
00613 //----------------------------------------------------------
00614 bool HandleMessage( SConnection* connection )
00615 {
00617         UT_message_t* message = UTMessageQueuePeek( &connection->inQueue );
00618         if ( !message || !UTMessageReady( message ) )
00619                 return false;
00620 
00623         if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
00624                 return false;
00625 
00627         bool ret = true;
00628         switch ( message->code )
00629         {
00630         case UTMSG_CLIENT_CREATE:
00631                 ret = HandleCreate( connection, message );
00632                 break;
00633 
00634         case UTMSG_CLIENT_OPEN:
00635                 ret = HandleOpen( connection, message );
00636                 break;
00637 
00638         case UTMSG_CLIENT_FINALIZE:
00639                 break;
00640 
00641         case UTMSG_CLIENT_CLOSE:
00642                 ret = HandleClose( connection, message );
00643                 break;
00644 
00645         case UTMSG_CLIENT_READ:
00646                 ret = TryRead( connection, message );
00647                 break;
00648 
00649         case UTMSG_CLIENT_READCANCEL:
00650                 break;
00651 
00652         case UTMSG_CLIENT_MULTI_READ:
00653                 ret = TryMultiRead( connection, message );
00654                 break;
00655 
00656         case UTMSG_CLIENT_WRITE:
00657                 ret = HandleWrite( connection, message );
00658                 break;
00659 
00660         case UTMSG_CLIENT_DIR_LISTING:
00661                 ret = HandleDirListing( connection, message );
00662                 break;
00663 
00664         case UTMSG_CLIENT_PING:
00665                 ret = HandlePing( connection, message );
00666         };
00667 
00669         UTMessageQueueRemove( &connection->inQueue );
00670 
00672         if ( !ret )
00673         {
00675                 UT_message_t* error = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
00676                 if ( error )
00677                 {
00678                         UTMessageWriteBegin( error, UTMSG_ERROR, message->transactionId );
00679                         UTMessageWriteEnd( error );
00680                 }
00681         }
00682 
00684         return ret;
00685 }
00686 
00687 //----------------------------------------------------------
00688 bool HandleCreate( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
00689 {
00691         if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
00692                 return false;
00693 
00695         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( message ) )
00696                 return false;
00697 
00699         int width = 0;
00700         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &width, message ) )
00701                 return false;
00702 
00704         int height = 0;
00705         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &height, message ) )
00706                 return false;
00707 
00709         unsigned int stageCount = 0;
00710         if ( !UTMessageReadUInt( &stageCount, message ) )
00711                 return false;
00712 
00714         UTFlags* flags = ( UTFlags* )_tempBuffer;
00715         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < stageCount; ++i )
00716         {
00717                 if ( !UTMessageReadUInt( flags + i, message ) )
00718                         return false;
00719         }
00720 
00722         int* channelCounts = ( int* )( _tempBuffer + ( UT_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE >> 1 ) );
00723         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < stageCount; ++i )
00724         {
00725                 if ( !UTMessageReadInt( channelCounts + i, message ) )
00726                         return false;
00727         }
00728 
00730         if ( !UTMessageReadStr( _strScratch + _workingFolderLen, STRING_BUFFER_LEN - _workingFolderLen, message ) )
00731                 return false;
00732 
00734         unsigned int streamID = AllocStream( _strScratch );
00735 
00737         UTX_stream_t* stream = &_streams[ streamID ].stream;
00738         _streams[ streamID ].refCount += 1;
00739 
00741         if ( UTX_IsStream( stream ) )
00742                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00743 
00745         if ( !UTX_CreateStream( stream, _strScratch, width, height, stageCount, flags, channelCounts ) )
00746                 return false;
00747 
00749         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
00750         if ( !response )
00751                 return false;
00752 
00754         UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId );
00755         UTMessageWriteUInt( response, streamID );
00756         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
00757 
00759         return true;
00760 }
00761 
00762 //----------------------------------------------------------
00763 bool HandleOpen( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
00764 {
00766         if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
00767                 return false;
00768 
00770         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( message ) )
00771                 return false;
00772 
00774         if ( !UTMessageReadStr( _strScratch + _workingFolderLen, STRING_BUFFER_LEN - _workingFolderLen, message ) )
00775                 return false;
00776 
00778         unsigned int streamID = AllocStream( _strScratch );
00779 
00781         UTX_stream_t* stream = &_streams[ streamID ].stream;
00782         if ( _streams[ streamID ].refCount == 0 )
00783         {
00784                 if ( !UTX_OpenStream( stream, _strScratch ) )
00785                         return false;
00786         }
00787         _streams[ streamID ].refCount += 1;
00788 
00790         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
00791         if ( !response )
00792                 return false;
00793 
00795         UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId );
00796         UTMessageWriteUInt( response, streamID );
00797         UTMessageWriteInt( response, UTX_GetWidth( stream ) );
00798         UTMessageWriteInt( response, UTX_GetHeight( stream ) );
00799         UTMessageWriteInt( response, UTX_NumStages( stream ) );
00800         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
00801 
00803         return true;
00804 }
00805 
00806 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
00807 //----------------------------------------------------------
00808 bool HandleClose( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
00809 {
00811         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( message ) )
00812                 return false;
00813 
00815         unsigned int streamID = 0;
00816         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( ( int* )&streamID, message ) )
00817                 return false;
00818         if ( streamID >= UT_STREAMS_MAX )
00819                 return false;
00820 
00822         UTX_stream_t* stream = &_streams[ streamID ].stream;
00823         if ( _streams[ streamID ].refCount == 0 )
00824                 return false;
00825 
00827         _streams[ streamID ].refCount -= 1;
00828 
00830         if ( _streams[ streamID ].refCount == 0 )
00831                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00832 
00834         return true;
00835 }
00836 #pragma warning( default : 4100 )
00837 
00838 //----------------------------------------------------------
00839 bool TryRead( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
00840 {
00842         bool didRead = HandleRead( connection, message );
00843         if( didRead )
00844                 return true;
00845 
00847         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
00848         if( !response ) 
00849         {
00851                 return true; 
00852         }
00853 
00855         int tileInfoSize = sizeof( int ) * 4;
00856 
00858         UTMessageReadBegin( message );
00859         UTMessageWriteBegin( response, UTMSG_ERROR, message->transactionId );
00860         UTMessageWriteBytes( response, UTMessageGetData( message, tileInfoSize ), tileInfoSize );
00861         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
00862         UTMessageReadEnd( message );
00863 
00865         return true;
00866 }
00867 
00868 //----------------------------------------------------------
00869 bool HandleRead( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
00870 {
00871 #if PROFILE_UBERSERVER
00872         unsigned int startTime = timeGetTime();
00873 #endif
00874 
00876         if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
00877                 return false;
00878 
00880         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( message ) )
00881                 return false;
00882 
00884         size_t count = UTMessageQueueCount( &connection->inQueue );
00885         for ( size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i )
00886         {
00888                 UT_message_t* cur = UTMessageQueuePeek( &connection->inQueue, i );
00889 
00891                 if ( cur->code == UTMSG_CLIENT_READCANCEL )
00892                 {
00894                         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( cur ) )
00895                                 continue;
00896 
00898                         unsigned int idToCancel = 0;
00899                         UTMessageReadUInt( &idToCancel, cur );
00900                         UTMessageReadEnd( cur );
00901 
00904                         if ( idToCancel == message->transactionId )
00905                         {
00906                                 ++_curReadsCancelled;
00907                                 return true;
00908                         }
00909                 }
00910         }
00911 
00912         ++_curReads;
00913 
00915         unsigned int streamID = 0;
00916         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( ( int* )&streamID, message ) )
00917                 return false;
00918         if ( streamID >= UT_STREAMS_MAX )
00919                 return false;
00920 
00922         UTX_stream_t* stream = &_streams[ streamID ].stream;
00923         if ( !UTX_IsStream( stream ) )
00924                 return false;
00925 
00927         int x = 0;
00928         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &x, message ) )
00929                 return false;
00930 
00931         int y = 0;
00932         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &y, message ) )
00933                 return false;
00934 
00935         int m = 0;
00936         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &m, message ) )
00937                 return false;
00938 
00940         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
00941         if ( !response )
00942                 return false;
00943 
00945         if ( !UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId ) )
00946                 return false;
00947 
00949         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, streamID ) )
00950                 return false;
00951 
00952         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, x ) )
00953                 return false;
00954 
00955         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, y ) )
00956                 return false;
00957 
00958         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, m ) )
00959                 return false;
00960 
00962         int tileSize = 0;
00963         if ( !UTX_ReadTile( stream, _tempBuffer, x, y, m, &tileSize ) )
00964                 return false;
00965         _curBytesRead += tileSize;
00966 
00968         if ( !UTMessageCompressData( response, _tempBuffer, tileSize ) )
00969                 return false;
00970 
00972         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
00973 
00974 #if PROFILE_UBERSERVER
00975         unsigned int endTime = timeGetTime();
00976         unsigned int totalTime = endTime - startTime;
00977         PrintF( "Uber-texture read occured, total time: %d\n", totalTime );
00978 #endif
00979 
00981         return true;
00982 }
00983 
00984 //----------------------------------------------------------
00985 bool TryMultiRead( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
00986 {
00988         bool didRead = HandleMultiRead( connection, message );
00989         if( didRead )
00990                 return true;
00991 
00993 
00995         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
00996         if( !response )
00997         {
01000                 return true;
01001         }
01002 
01004         UTMessageWriteBegin( response, UTMSG_MULTI_READ_ERROR, message->transactionId );
01005         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
01006 
01008         return true;
01009 }
01010 
01011 //----------------------------------------------------------
01012 bool HandleMultiRead( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
01013 {
01014 #if PROFILE_UBERSERVER
01015         unsigned int startTime = timeGetTime();
01016 #endif
01018         if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
01019                 return false;
01020 
01022         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( message ) )
01023                 return false;
01024 
01026         unsigned int streamID = 0;
01027         if ( !UTMessageReadUInt( &streamID, message ) )
01028                 return false;
01029         if ( streamID >= UT_STREAMS_MAX )
01030                 return false;
01031 
01033         UTX_stream_t* stream = &_streams[ streamID ].stream;
01034         if ( !UTX_IsStream( stream ) )
01035                 return false;
01036 
01038         int tileCount = 0;
01039         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &tileCount, message ) )
01040                 return false;
01041 
01042 #if PROFILE_MULTI_READ
01043         unsigned int totalTime = 0;
01044         unsigned int startTime = timeGetTime();
01045         unsigned int initTileCount = tileCount;
01046         unsigned int startBytesRead = _curBytesRead;
01047         unsigned int startBytesSent = _curTotalBytesSent;
01048 #endif
01049 
01051         unsigned int* tilesReq = ( unsigned int* )UTMessageGetData( message, tileCount * sizeof( unsigned int ) );
01052         unsigned int* curReq = tilesReq;
01053         while ( tileCount > 0 )
01054         {
01057                 unsigned int tilesToHandle = Min( tileCount, UT_MULTI_READ_MAX );
01058 
01060                 UTX_OptimizeReadOrder( stream, curReq, tilesToHandle );
01061 
01063                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < tilesToHandle; ++i )
01064                 {
01066                         int m = ( curReq[ i ] & 0xFF );
01067                         int x = ( curReq[ i ] >>  8 ) & 0xFFF;
01068                         int y = ( curReq[ i ] >> 20 ) & 0xFFF;
01069 
01071                         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
01072                         while( !response )
01073                         {
01075                                 Sleep( 1 );
01076 
01078                                 UpdateConnectionOutgoing( connection );
01079 
01081                                 response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
01082                         }
01083 
01085                         if ( !UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId ) )
01086                                 return false;
01087 
01089                         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, streamID ) )
01090                                 return false;
01091 
01092                         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, x ) )
01093                                 return false;
01094 
01095                         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, y ) )
01096                                 return false;
01097 
01098                         if( !UTMessageWriteInt( response, m ) )
01099                                 return false;
01100 
01102                         int tileSize = 0;
01103                         if ( !UTX_ReadTile( stream, _tempBuffer, x, y, m, &tileSize ) )
01104                                 return false;
01105                         _curBytesRead += tileSize;
01106 
01108                         if ( !UTMessageCompressData( response, _tempBuffer, tileSize ) )
01109                                 return false;
01110 
01112                         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
01113 
01115                         UpdateConnectionOutgoing( connection );
01116                 }
01117 
01119                 curReq += tilesToHandle;
01120 
01122                 tileCount -= tilesToHandle;
01123         }
01124 
01125 #if PROFILE_MULTI_READ
01126         totalTime = timeGetTime() - startTime;
01127         if ( totalTime == 0 )
01128                 totalTime = 1;
01129         double timeInSec = ( totalTime / 1000.0f );
01130         float tilesPerSec = ( float )( initTileCount / timeInSec );
01131         float mbPerSec = ( float )( ( ( _curBytesRead - startBytesRead ) / timeInSec ) / 1048576.0 );
01132         float bytesSentPerSec = ( float )( ( ( _curTotalBytesSent - startBytesSent ) / timeInSec ) / 1024.0 );
01133 
01134         PrintF( "Uber-texture multi-read occured.\n" );
01135         PrintF( "  Total time:  %d\n", totalTime );
01136         PrintF( "  Tile count:  %d\n", initTileCount );
01137         PrintF( "  Tiles/sec:   %.2f\n", tilesPerSec );
01138         PrintF( "  MB read/sec: %.2f\n", mbPerSec );
01139         PrintF( "  KB sent/sec: %.2f\n", bytesSentPerSec );
01140 #endif
01141 
01142 #if PROFILE_UBERSERVER
01143         unsigned int endTime = timeGetTime();
01144         unsigned int totalTime = endTime - startTime;
01145         PrintF( "Uber-texture read occured, total time: %d\n", totalTime );
01146 #endif
01147 
01149         return true;
01150 }
01151 
01152 //----------------------------------------------------------
01153 bool HandleWrite( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
01154 {
01156         if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
01157                 return false;
01158 
01160         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( message ) )
01161                 return false;
01162 
01163         unsigned int streamID = 0;
01164         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( ( int* )&streamID, message ) )
01165                 return false;
01166         if ( streamID >= UT_STREAMS_MAX )
01167                 return false;
01168 
01170         UTX_stream_t* stream = &_streams[ streamID ].stream;
01171         if ( !UTX_IsStream( stream ) )
01172                 return false;
01173 
01175         int x = 0;
01176         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &x, message ) )
01177                 return false;
01178 
01179         int y = 0;
01180         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &y, message ) )
01181                 return false;
01182 
01183         int m = 0;
01184         if ( !UTMessageReadInt( &m, message ) )
01185                 return false;
01186 
01189         int stageCount = UTX_NumStages( stream );
01190         int channelCount = 0;
01191         for ( int stage = 0; stage < stageCount; ++stage )
01192                 channelCount += UTX_NumStageChannels( stream, stage );
01193 
01195         if ( !UTMessageDecompressData( _tempBuffer, channelCount * UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES, message ) )
01196                 return false;
01197 
01199         int bytesWritten = 0;
01200         if ( !UTX_WriteTile( stream, x, y, m, _tempBuffer, &bytesWritten ) )
01201                 return false;
01202         _curBytesWritten += bytesWritten;
01203 
01205         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
01206         if ( !response )
01207                 return false;
01208 
01210         if ( !UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId ) )
01211                 return false;
01212 
01214         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
01215 
01217         UTMessageReadEnd( message );
01218 
01220         return true;
01221 }
01222 
01223 //----------------------------------------------------------
01224 bool HandleDirListing( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
01225 {
01227         if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
01228                 return false;
01229 
01231         if ( !UTMessageReadBegin( message ) )
01232                 return false;
01233 
01235         if ( !UTMessageReadStr( _strScratch + _workingFolderLen, STRING_BUFFER_LEN - _workingFolderLen, message ) )
01236                 return false;
01237 
01239         strcat_s( _strScratch, STRING_BUFFER_LEN, "/*.*" );
01240 
01242         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
01243         if ( !response )
01244                 return false;
01245 
01247         if ( !UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId ) )
01248                 return false;
01249 
01251         unsigned int fileCount = 0;
01252         WIN32_FIND_DATA findData;
01253         HANDLE findHandle = FindFirstFile( _strScratch, &findData );
01254         if ( findHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
01255         {
01257                 do {
01258                         if ( strcmp( findData.cFileName, ".." ) != 0 && strcmp( findData.cFileName, "." ) != 0 )
01259                                 ++fileCount;            
01260                 } while ( FindNextFile( findHandle, &findData ) );
01261         }
01262 
01264         UTMessageWriteUInt( response, fileCount );
01265 
01267         unsigned int sentFileCount = 0;
01268         findHandle = FindFirstFile( _strScratch, &findData );
01269         if ( findHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
01270         {
01271                 do
01272                 {
01274                         if ( strcmp( findData.cFileName, ".." ) == 0 || strcmp( findData.cFileName, "." ) == 0 )
01275                                 continue;
01276 
01278                         if ( !UTMessageWriteStr( response, findData.cFileName ) )
01279                         {
01281                                 UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
01282 
01285                                 if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
01286                                 {
01287                                         int bytesSent = 0;
01288                                         UTMessageQueueSend( connection->socket, &connection->outQueue,
01289                                                 _combineBuffer, SEND_BUFFER_SIZE, &bytesSent, connection->sendProc );
01290                                         _curTotalBytesSent += bytesSent;
01291                                 }
01292 
01294                                 if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &connection->outQueue ) )
01295                                         return false;
01296 
01298                                 response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
01299                                 if ( !response )
01300                                         return false;
01301                                 if ( !UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId ) )
01302                                         return false;
01303                                 if ( !UTMessageWriteStr( response, findData.cFileName ) )
01304                                         return false;
01305                         }
01306 
01308                         ++sentFileCount;
01309 
01310                 } while ( FindNextFile( findHandle, &findData ) );
01311         }
01312 
01314         FindClose( findHandle );
01315 
01317         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
01318 
01320         UTMessageReadEnd( message );
01321 
01323         return sentFileCount == fileCount;
01324 }

01326 //----------------------------------------------------------
01327 bool HandlePing( SConnection* connection, UT_message_t* message )
01328 {
01330         UT_message_t* response = UTMessageQueueAdd( &connection->outQueue );
01331         if ( !response )
01332                 return false;
01333 
01335         if ( !UTMessageWriteBegin( response, message->code, message->transactionId ) )
01336                 return false;
01337 
01339         UTMessageWriteEnd( response );
01340 
01342         return true;
01343 }

01345 //----------------------------------------------------------
01346 unsigned int AllocStream( char* fileName )
01347 {
01349         unsigned int len = ( unsigned int )strlen( fileName );
01350 
01352         for ( int i = 0; i < ( int )len; ++i )
01353         {
01354                 fileName[ i ] = ( char )tolower( fileName[ i ] );
01355                 if ( fileName[ i ] == '\\' )
01356                         fileName[ i ] = '/';
01357         }
01358 
01360         unsigned int hash = HashMem32( fileName, len );
01361         unsigned int idx = hash % UT_STREAMS_MAX;
01362 
01364         int count = UT_STREAMS_MAX;
01365         while ( _streams[ idx ].refCount > 0 && count-- > 0 )
01366         {
01369 
01370                 if( _streams[idx].stream.fileName != 0 )
01371                 {
01373                         if ( strcmp( fileName, _streams[ idx ].stream.fileName ) == 0 )
01374                                 return idx;
01375                 }
01376 
01378                 idx += 1;
01379                 idx %= UT_STREAMS_MAX;
01380         }
01381 
01383         if ( count < 0 )
01384                 return ~0U;
01385 
01387         return idx;
01388 }
01389 
01390 //----------------------------------------------------------
01391 bool CloseConnection( unsigned int idx )
01392 {
01394         if ( idx >= UT_CONNECTION_MAX )
01395                 return false;
01396 
01398         if ( _connections[ idx ].socket != INVALID_SOCKET )
01399         {
01400                 closesocket( _connections[ idx ].socket );
01401                 _connections[ idx ].socket = INVALID_SOCKET;
01402                 _connections[ idx ].enabled = 0;
01403                 if ( _connections[ idx ].local )
01404                 {
01405                         SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
01406                         SafeCloseHandle( _recvMutex );
01407                 }
01408                 UTMessageQueueDestroy( &_connections[ idx ].inQueue );
01409                 UTMessageQueueDestroy( &_connections[ idx ].outQueue );
01410         }
01411 
01413         return true;
01414 }
01415 
01416 //----------------------------------------------------------
01417 void CloseAllConnections()
01418 {
01419         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < UT_CONNECTION_MAX; ++i )
01420         {
01421                 if ( _connections[ i ].socket != INVALID_SOCKET )
01422                 {
01423                         closesocket( _connections[ i ].socket );
01424                         _connections[ i ].socket = INVALID_SOCKET;
01425                         _connections[ i ].enabled = 0;
01426                         UTMessageQueueDestroy( &_connections[ i ].inQueue );
01427                         UTMessageQueueDestroy( &_connections[ i ].outQueue );
01428                 }
01429         }
01430 }
01431 
01432 //----------------------------------------------------------
01433 void Cleanup()
01434 {
01436         CloseAllConnections();
01437         closesocket( _primarySocket );
01438 
01440         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < UT_STREAMS_MAX; ++i )
01441                 UTX_CloseStream( &_streams[ i ].stream );
01442 }

01444 //----------------------------------------------------------
01445 static unsigned int __stdcall UTServeThreadProc( void* param )
01446 {
01447         return ( unsigned int )UTServe( ( unsigned short )( size_t )param );
01448 }

01450 //----------------------------------------------------------
01451 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
01452 int __stdcall
01453 SendLocal( SOCKET s, const char* buf, int len, int flags )
01454 {
01455         WaitForSingleObject( _sendMutex, INFINITE );
01456 
01458         unsigned int writeAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 0 ];
01459         unsigned int readAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 1 ];
01460 
01462         if ( readAddr == writeAddr )
01463         {
01464                 ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 0 ] = writeAddr = 0;
01465                 ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 1 ] = readAddr = 0;
01466         }
01467 
01469         unsigned int spaceRemaining = UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_SIZE - writeAddr - 8;
01470         len = Min( ( int )spaceRemaining, len );
01471 
01473         char* dst = ( char* )_sendBuffer + 8;
01474         MemCopy( dst + writeAddr, buf, len );
01475 
01477         ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 0 ] += len;
01478 
01480         ReleaseMutex( _sendMutex );
01481         return len;
01482 }
01483 #pragma warning( default : 4100 )
01484 
01485 //----------------------------------------------------------
01486 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
01487 int __stdcall
01488 RecvLocal( SOCKET s, char* buf, int len, int flags )
01489 {
01490         WaitForSingleObject( _recvMutex, INFINITE );
01491 
01493         unsigned int writeAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 0 ];
01494         unsigned int readAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 1 ];
01495 
01497         unsigned int available = writeAddr - readAddr;
01498         len = Min( ( int )available, len );
01499 
01501         const char* src = ( const char* )_recvBuffer + 8;
01502         MemCopy( buf, src + readAddr, len );
01503 
01505         ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 1 ] += len;
01506 
01508         ReleaseMutex( _recvMutex );
01509         return len;
01510 }
01511 #pragma warning( default : 4100 )
01512 
01513 //----------------------------------------------------------
01514 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
01515 int __stdcall
01516 IoctlLocal( SOCKET s, long cmd, unsigned long* argp )
01517 {
01518         WaitForSingleObject( _recvMutex, INFINITE );
01519 
01521         unsigned int writeAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 0 ];
01522         unsigned int readAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 1 ];
01523 
01525         *argp = writeAddr - readAddr;
01526 
01528         ReleaseMutex( _recvMutex );
01529         return 0;
01530 }
01531 #pragma warning( default : 4100 )
